description: Princess Hinoto is a dreamseer who dwells beneath the Japanese Diet Building, using her powers of prescience to advise the Japanese government. She is blind, deaf, mute, and lame, and must communicate telepathically, but none of her predictions has ever failed to come true. She foresees the battle between the Dragons of Heaven and Earth and the coming of Kamui, but is unable to determine which path he will choose.
name: Hinoto
